As he wearisomely traces out the subtle distinctions that underlie some illa· tive particle, or characterize some doubtful prepo- sition, let him cheer himself with the reflection that every effort of thought he is thus enabled to make, is (with God's blessing) a step towards the inner shrine, a nearer approach to a recognition of the thoughts of an Apostle, yea, a less dim per- ception of the mind of Christ.
